entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a friend of Harry's who might start dating Hermione. He is described as yelling 'Gotcha!' during the lesson.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a friend of Harry's who might start dating Ron. She is described as bursting open a pod to reveal tubers.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as an example of someone who got married and became embarrassing to be around.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as Bill's wife and the one who makes their presence excruciatingly embarrassing.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione might start dating, which could affect their friendship with Harry.
